segments.text: Hi , I'm here to check in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please fill out this registration 1 form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you ... Excuse me , sir . You forgot to fill in your visa number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did I ? Let me see that ... Oh , sorry ... here you are .
segments.speaker: S2
